tasks.title: Build Task Button
tasks.description: Add functionality to the add task button, in which a user is taken to a different screen, where they can add a task. This task will be added to the list of tasks on the main screen. Hold off on complex task splitting for now.

tasks.title: Card Styling
tasks.description: Add better content to cards. This may include adding priority (likely to replace date), estimated completion time, organized descriptions (SMART goals?) and other things that may be useful to the user.

tasks.title: Accept Task Button
tasks.description: Create and add functionality to an accept task button on the task card. This will allow the user to accept a task, and it will be added to their list of tasks. This will also remove the task from the list of available tasks.

tasks.title: Brain Storm
tasks.description: Brainstorm ideas for the app. Current ideas include: Geometrical progress screen, task splitting, a work zone (special screen that contains all your tasks), a reward system, etc.
